body.p: The Reviewer refers to subject matter experts or other team members who are asked to review documentation that has been uploaded to the server by the Content Author. The Reviewer simply clicks on a link that is sent to them to access the task that contains the documents to be reviewed in their default browser. They can open each file to proofread, add comments, and make changes in a simple, visual editor. If they want other Reviewers to look at the documents, they can share the task with them and all of them can communicate with each other and the Content Author throughout the review process. Once the Reviewer finishes the review process, the Content Author will have the ability to merge all of the changes.
This guide provides instructions and information about everything the Reviewer has access to in regards to .
